title: Why exercise?
creator_credit: Associated Film Services and Jan Sadlo
brief_description: Illustrates the values of muscular activity, emphasizing the fact that the human body makes adaptations to the exercise demands place upon it and these adaptations are in the form of increased strength, greater endurance, and improved flexibility.
description: Illustrates the values of muscular activity, emphasizing the fact that the human body makes adaptations to the exercise demands place upon it and these adaptations are in the form of increased strength, greater endurance, and improved flexibility.
